I appreciated your well thought out response. I understand and don't disagree. I do think though that there is a huge revolution going on. Will the bottom up create more parties? I think it will through HUGE costs, mostly dead Americans: White, black Latino, our youth, progressives and those that refuse, like you and me, to put up with this crap anymore. My point: I think, if Bernie is NOT another Obama ( hoe and change lies) and we can get money out of politics we have a chance. A chance to really remove all these criminals and mold this country into what we all want it to be """" A representative democracy.
